official_title: A joint resolution to amend the Social Security Act to delay the imposition of certain requirements on public hospitals until the expiration of their current fiscal years.

summary.text: Amends the Social Security Act (as amended by the Social Security Amendments of 1983) to delay the imposition of certain requirements relating to reimbursement procedures for services performed in public hospitals under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Act until the expiration of a hospital's current fiscal year.

titles.title: A joint resolution to amend the Social Security Act to delay the imposition of certain requirements on public hospitals until the expiration of their current fiscal years.
